endpoints.description: Retrieve the real-time latency data for the monitored network.
Fetch the current throughput values across the network.
Obtain the ongoing error rate statistics of network operations.
Register for receiving alerts regarding network anomalies or potential disruptions.
Unsubscribe from the alert notifications for network updates.
Access performance metrics for a specific operational region by its region ID.
Retrieve a list of triggered alerts and their details.
Update and configure the monitoring preferences and settings.
Check the overall operational status and health of the service endpoints.
Submit user feedback regarding the service and its functionality.
